pages.text: $(2)/dank/null$() is basically a gigantic backpack that can surpass the stacking limit of Minecraft. Each type of item can be stacked to a high amount and if you pick up items that exist in the /dank/null, it will be automatically put into it.$(br)/dank/null has many tiers and you get more slots and higher stack limits by upgrading. An iron /dank/null will be given to you after getting your first diamond.

$(9)$(l)Usages of /dank/null include:$()$(br)$(li)Shift-right-click with /dank/null in hand to open its GUI.$(li)Ctrl-click any item in it to change its extraction mode.$(li)Alt-click any item in it to select it, which can be placed by right clicking with a /dank/null if it is a placable block.
